item.title: Post: Shaved 3 Seconds Off Site Build Time!
item.description: And I spent two days doing it. So let’s see. If I somehow post every day, that work should pay off somewhere around — counts on fingers — 2026? Okay I did other stuff besides micro-optimization, but still. I am amused.
item.content:encoded:
And I spent two days doing it. So let’s see. If I somehow post every day, that work should pay off somewhere around — counts on fingers — 2026?

Okay I did other stuff besides micro-optimization, but still. I am amused.
